thread.title: Pregnant Amal Clooney shows off baby bump in pink velvet dress
thread.title_full: Pregnant Amal Clooney shows off baby bump in pink velvet dress

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Pregnant Amal Clooney shows off baby bump in pink velvet dress
text:
Pregnant Amal Clooney shows off baby bump in pink velvet dress The human rights lawyer is expecting twins with husband George Clooney Share Amal Clooney looks radiant in a pink velvet dress and pink coat (Photo: Felipe Ramales / Splash News) Share Get celebs   Could   
Amal Clooney must be a Mean Girls fan - because on Wednesday, she wore pink. 
The pregnant human rights lawyer - who is expecting twins with her husband George Clooney - stepped out and showed off her growing baby bump after visiting the United Nations headquarters on International Women's Day. 
Showcasing her effortless sense of style, Amal was spotted leaving her hotel hours after the Fight Against Impunity for Atrocities: Bringing Da'esh to Justice event in New York City. Amal Clooney looks radiant in a pink velvet dress and pink coat (Photo: Splash News) 
She stepped out in a pink velvet knee length dress on Wednesday evening, with a salmon pink coat worn over the top to complete the look. Read More 
A source told E! News: "She was in good spirits. [She] was polite with everyone and had a smile other face. She took some time after the U.N. event and before she went out again." The couple are expecting twins (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Last month, George opened up about impending fatherhood and described as "an adventure" . Read More 
He said: "We are really happy and really excited. It's going to be an adventure. We've sort of embraced it all with arms wide open." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
